title: AppleCare+: Here’s how much repair costs if you damage the new Studio Display
content:
The new Studio Display isn’t even out yet, but if you’re curious about repair costs – whether you add AppleCare+ to the monitor – Apple is now letting people know what those costs are.

more…

The post AppleCare+: Here’s how much repair costs if you damage the new Studio Display appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: The new Studio Display isn't even out yet, but if you're curious about repair costs with AppleCare+ included, here they are.
